Reference

All functions

cache_clear()

clears the cache

cbs_add_date_column()

Convert the time variable into either a date or numeric.

cbs_add_label_columns()

For each column with codes add label column to data set

cbs_add_statcode_column()

Prepares dataset for making a map

cbs_add_unit_column()

For each topic column add a unit column

cbs_default_selection()

extract the default selection from a cbsodata meta object

cbs_download_data()

Gets all data from a cbs table.

cbs_download_meta()

Dumps the meta data into a directory

cbs_download_table()

Download a table from statistics Netherlands

cbs_extract_table_id()

extract the id of a cbs table from the statline url

cbs_get_catalogs()

Retrieves the possible catalog values that can be used for retrieving data

cbs_get_data()

Get data from Statistics Netherlands (CBS)

cbs_get_data_from_link()

Retrieve data from a link created from the StatLine app.

cbs_get_datasets()

Retrieve a data.frame with requested cbs tables

cbs_get_maps()

Get list of cbs maps

cbs_get_meta()

Get metadata of a cbs table

cbs_get_meta_from_dir()

Load meta data from a downloaded table

cbs_get_sf()

Retrieve an sf map for plotting

cbs_get_tables_themes()

Get a the list of tables connected to themes

cbs_get_themes()

Get list of all cbs thematic entries.

cbs_get_toc()

Retrieve a data.frame with requested cbs tables

cbs_join_sf_with_data()

Create a map with data from cbsodataR

cbs_search()

Find tables containing search words

cbsodataR cbsodataR-package

Download all data from Statistics Netherlands / CBS

download_data()

Gets all data from a cbs table.

download_meta()

Dumps the meta data into a directory

download_table()

Download a table from statistics Netherlands

eq()

Detect codes in a column

get_data()

Get data from Statistics Netherlands (CBS)

get_meta()

Get meta data from table

get_meta_from_dir()

Load meta data from a downloaded table

get_table_list()

Retrieve a data.frame with requested cbs tables

get_tables_themes()

Get a the list of tables connected to themes

get_themes()

Get list of all cbs thematic entries.

has_substring()

Detect substring in column column

resolve_deeplink()

resolve a deeplink created in the opendata portal
